lines.text: What do you see in that dame?
What did I see in you? Oh... nothing. She just makes me curious.
Curious? Hmmph. One look at a skirt and you're curious. Why don't you get curious about me?
I did. That's why I proposed to you.
And now your curiosity's over, you want to call it a day.
When I think of all we were to each other... Then when I catch up with you, what do I find? Oh when I think of every--
Stop thinking and give your larynx a rest.
Aw, come on. Skin back your ivories. You're as limp as spaghetti. You're the saddest group of courtroom victors I ever trained a lens on.
But you could swallow it... if it was mixed with a little gin, couldn't ya?
Yes, dear, in a silver fizz.

[Catching Murdock with Meg a second time]
Maybe you'd like me to wear a bell or something.
